TopicTitle: Got the game today. but i cant connect parts together

Articles.Content: I got Kerbal space program today (after 3 months of begging my parents) but no parts are connecting with each other, I need some help.

52 minutes ago, Rpmm24 said:

I got Kerbal space program today (after 3 months of begging my parents) but no parts are connecting with each other, I need some help.

Welcome!   You are now one of the afflicted, doughnuts and coffee are over there, please, find a seat and we'll begin shortly!

Some pics of what you are doing might help us.   Some parts will snap together nicely when they are placed inline with each other, some will snap to the outside of another part (radial).

Start off with any command pod, and place that in the VAB.  Then grab any fuel tank, and place that beneath the pod.   Try to line up the green bubbles, and the parts should snap in place.    If this doesn't work for you, then there might be something amiss.    So when you are trying to place a part, hit f1 to take a screenshot, and then upload that to something like imgr.    You can then post the picture here so we can help figure out the issue.

Welcome to the forums. Sorry that you are having a problem.

54 minutes ago, Rpmm24 said:

but no parts are connecting with each other

Hmmmm. That should be impossible.

When impossible things happen, generally it means that your copy of the game got corrupted -- which is usually pretty easy to fix.

But we should probably verify things anyway. Which version of the game do you have? Current 1.5.1? Where did you buy it from? Steam?

Are you trying the Beginning Construction Tutorial in the game? Can you click on a "first" part for the rocket and have that get placed? Can you describe exactly what you see when you try to stick a second part onto it?
